title: Modulation and engineering of MOF-derived transition metal selenides/NiFe LDH for the application in electrocatalytic hydrogen evolution
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00180J, Paper
Jin Liang, Hang Luo, Tian Lei, Guang Yang
Alkaline electrolysis represents a commercially viable technology for the eco-friendly production of high-purity hydrogen. Metal-organic frameworks (MOFs), with their abundant morphology, tunable electronic structure, and stability, are frequently employed as...
